name: LoungeflyJasmine: Princess Series Mini-rugzak - Merchoid Nederland
description: Stap een hele nieuwe wereld met Loungefly's Disney Jasmine Princess Series Mini Backpack! This isn't just any regular backpack, oh no! This magical accessory is like taking a ride on a magical carpet - it'll take you places you've never been before! With its flickable design, you'll be whisked away on adventures with just a simple twist of your wrist. Talk about genie-us!As you embark on your journey, you'll be accompanied by Princess Jasmine, Aladdin, and their band of friends. This backpack is a work of art - quite literally! With original in-house created illustrations on every side, you'll feel like you're walking through a museum exhibit. The top of the backpack features a romantic moment shared between Prince Ali and his princess. Want a peek inside? The rectangular-shaped pocket showcases Jasmine, Rajah, and The Sultan. And let's not forget the front zipped compartment - the lush wooded scene reveals Princess Jasmine and Rajah in all their glory.The right panel of the backpack features Genie himself, ready to grant your every wish. On the left panel? Abu and the lamp, of course! And if you're a Jafar and Iago fan, you'll be delighted to know they make an appearance on the back of the backpack. This accessory is fit for both a trip to Disneyland or for turning everyday errands into magical experiences.Crafted with only the finest materials, this backpack's sturdy gold-colored metal hardware and adjustable straps mean that it's not just pretty - it's also practical. And with side pockets, you can easily stash your genie lamp (or phone) for easy access. The vegan leather (polyurethane) gives this backpack a sleek finish while staying true to our appreciation for animal rights. Oh, and don't forget the Abu enamel zipper charm - it's the cherry on top of this ensemble!Whether you're heading out on an adventure or running errands, there's no doubt that this LoungeflyDe Disney Jasmine Princess Series Mini-rugzak wordt jouw favoriete accessoire. Maak je klaar om een ​​hele nieuwe wereld te ervaren - het is een geheel nieuw fantastisch gezichtspunt. Hier is een kort overzicht van de kenmerken van de rugzak: - Officieel gelicentieerd Disney-product - Verstelbare bandjes voor een comfortabele pasvorm voor elke avonturier - Stevige goudkleurige metalen hardware om je schatten veilig te bewaren - Zijvakken om de lamp, snacks of telefoon van je geest op te bergen voor gemakkelijke toegang- Veganistisch leer (polyurethaan) voor dierenliefhebbers, fashionista's en milieubewuste mensen- Originele, in eigen huis gemaakte illustraties van je favoriete personages- Afmetingen: 9.5” Bx 10” H x 4.5 inch D (Breedte wordt gemeten over de onderkant van de rugzak.) Productdetails Producttype: Mini-rugzak Licentie: Jasmine Fabrikant:LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 750 gram (26 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDBK2761GTIN: 671803437715
